tool_description: Efficient Guid generator, fast and flexible.
name: GUID Generator Tool
title: GUID Generator Tool

api_list.name: Multiple GUIDs
api_list.description:
Endpoint to retrieve a multiple GUIDs, returned as a a string array.
Required query string parameter: *number* - needs to be between 0 and 1000.
GET only query.
Return content-type is text/json.

api_list.name: Single GUID
api_list.description:
Endpoint to retrieve a single GUID, returned as a simple string.
No parameters required.
GET only query.
Return content-type is text/plain.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://guid-generator-tool.p.rapidapi.com/httptriggerguidgenerate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guid-generator-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://guid-generator-tool.p.rapidapi.com/httptriggerguidgenerate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "guid-generator-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
